subject: Re: [sugar] Where did "develop" development go?
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Mike C. Fletcher wrote:
> I don't see any recent activity on the head of the project/activity.  Is 
> there still active work going on somewhere?  Has work shifted to some 
> other project/approach?

Hey Mike!

Yeah, it's not dead (yet).

I'm actually going to be rewriting some of it soon, and also waiting on
a source editing widget from the Abiword guys.

> 
> Curious,
> Mike
> 

- --
Regards,
Andrew Clunis
